instructions: CRITICAL: Only modify the 'passes' field when a feature is verified working via browser automation. Do NOT modify feature descriptions or steps.

features.description: Quick Actions buttons updated with New Task button
steps: Update Quick Actions card in Dashboard.jsx
Add 'New Task' button alongside existing buttons
Wire button to open CreateTaskModal (state will be added)
Wrap New Task button in isFeatureEnabled('tasksAndSequences') check
Verify build passes

features.description: CreateTaskModal integration with New Task button
steps: Import CreateTaskModal from @/components/tasks/CreateTaskModal
Add useState for createTaskOpen: const [createTaskOpen, setCreateTaskOpen] = useState(false)
Wire New Task button onClick to setCreateTaskOpen(true)
Render <CreateTaskModal open={createTaskOpen} onOpenChange={setCreateTaskOpen} />
Browser verify: Click New Task -> modal opens

features.description: Tasks Due Today list with pagination
steps: Create src/components/dashboard/TasksDueTodayList.tsx component
Query tasks where due_date = today, limit 5
Display task title, restaurant name, due time
Add 'View All' link to /tasks page
Wrap in isFeatureEnabled('tasksAndSequences') check
Browser verify: Tasks list shows on Dashboard
Create src/components/dashboard/PendingLeadsPreview.tsx component
Query leads where status = 'pending', limit 5
Display restaurant name, city, cuisine, created date
Add 'View All' link to /leads?tab=pending
Wrap in isFeatureEnabled('leadScraping') check
Browser verify: Pending leads preview shows on Dashboard
Create src/components/dashboard/BatchRegistrationPreview.tsx component
Query registration_batches ordered by created_at desc, limit 5
Display batch name, status, restaurant count, date
Add 'View All' link to /registration-batches
Wrap in isFeatureEnabled('registrationBatches') check
Browser verify: Batch registration preview shows on Dashboard

features.description: Recent Restaurants preview with city filter
steps: Create src/components/dashboard/RecentRestaurantsPreview.tsx component
Query restaurants ordered by created_at desc, limit 5
Display restaurant name, city, created date
Add optional city filter dropdown
Add 'View All' link to /restaurants
No feature flag required
Browser verify: Recent restaurants preview shows on Dashboard
Login as support@pumpd.co.nz (limited permissions)
Verify Tasks Due Today list IS visible
Verify Recent Restaurants preview IS visible
Verify Pending Leads preview is HIDDEN
Verify Batch Registration preview is HIDDEN
Verify CityBreakdownTab is HIDDEN
Verify New Task button is HIDDEN
No console errors present
